description.value: Immune to effects of Daemonic Presence, including negative Willpower Modifiers. Can spend a fate point to not take fear tests, not acquire insanity, and not gain corruption for the duration of an encounter. Can burn a fate point to resist any single daemonic or psychic attack and emerge unscathed.
